archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Enrich Billing Events
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Enrich billing event records with additional data.

properties.value: The Enrich Billing Events processes will augment the billing event records by adding data to the records from sources such as customer, product, or other reference data. A billing event may be assigned a price without consideration of specific product or customer information. The assigned price may be used to enrich the billing event record.
